<p><i><b>Secret</b></i> is the fourth studio album released by <a href="/wiki/J-pop" title="J-pop">J-pop</a> singer <a href="/wiki/Kumi_Koda" title="Kumi Koda">Kumi Koda</a>, released in February, 2005. The album was released in four different formats: the regular <a href="/wiki/CD" title="CD" class="mw-redirect">CD</a> and <a href="/wiki/CD" title="CD" class="mw-redirect">CD</a>+<a href="/wiki/DVD" title="DVD">DVD</a> editions, plus three special editions: "Secret Special Edition" (with the video of "Hot Stuff" feat. KM-Markit" included on the DVD, which wasn't included before), "Secret Special Edition for Live" (both of them CD+DVD, one edition comes with a T-shirt, the other with a tank-top). These editions were released on April 13, 2005.</p>
